scripts.setup: npm install && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd strudel && git checkout main && git pull && cd .. && git commit -a -m 'Updated Strudel from origin.'
scripts.build-repl: cp strudel-addons/csoundac/ strudel/packages/ && cd strudel && npm run setup && npm run build
scripts.build: vite build && cp -rf strudel/website/dist/* dist/ && mv dist/index.html dist/strudel_repl.html && ls -ll dist
